title: The West
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indians of North America
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/America - Discovery and exploration
description: A historical account through to 1914 of the American West presented as an eight-part documentary series for television. Includes archival footage, stills, newsreels, diaries and artefacts, and commentary by historians, writers and anthropologists (American and Native American), with spectacular images of the landscape and haunting background music. Narrated by Peter Coyote.
